channel.title: Need a command 317 [PI]
channel.description:
Need a command to give pkp (pk points) while ingame instead of files example:
::givepkp Jarrod 9999
Please I need it urgently.

item.title: Need a command 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givepkpoints")) { c.getPA().pkpPoints = 999999999; c.sendMessage("You now have 999,999,999 Pk Points."); }

You can’t type there name in and give them specific points with this command, but this still works.

Note: If this doesn’t work; post the error. Also, I’m not sure what your pkp points are declared as so you’ll need to chage it to what they’re declared as.

Read full topic
